title: Average ticket price of the Tampa Bay Buccaneers 2006 to 2019
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Average ticket price in U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 13.
Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2006 to 2008, slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2015, slightly increasing from 2015 to 2018, and finally roughly constant from 2018 to 2019.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2007 and 2008.
The highest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 90.13 was reached at Year 2008
The lowest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 63.59 was reported at Year 2013,  2014, and 2015
